website_summaries.verdict: Wherever you're hanging out, this lanyard-style speaker will hang with you.
pros: Durable and waterproof with good sound
Can hang from lamp, backpack, bike handlebars, or anywhere else you want music
cons: Music pauses when you press button to change the light
Cannot shut off light indicating Bluetooth connection

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.  Cool look.  Light feature is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.text: This is VERY cool iteam. It projects sound well. It doesn't have great bass but at this price point it's still better then I expected. The light feature is so right on. Can't wait to take it camping/up in the wilderness. It is as described. I'm gunna buy another one in a different color. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: theunderdawg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, very good sound, lots of power, great for my bicycle riding and safer than using headphones.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this more than 5 stars I would. It's just perfect. The sound is clear and with plenty of volume to allow for playing it on my bicycle in traffic. It also covers the entire patio. It's not a 12" subwoofer but the sound is very good. I am particularly pleased with using it on my bicycle for long rides -- it is easy to fasten to most anything with the flexible band and it has very long battery life. A four hour bicycle ride didn't run it out. It paired immediately and pairs without any difficulty time after time. I just love this thing. I bought a second one for our granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Love my Springer

customer_reviews.title: buy the LESHP Bluteooth Speaker instead
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Flimsy construction. Feels cheap. Worked for 10 seconds subsequent to charging. Okay, maybe this *one* was defective. But, even had it worked, it looked and felt more like a pet toy than a speaker. Okay, so it was only about $20. But, for the same price, you can get a solidly constructed speaker (that still fits in the palm of your hand) with super-great bass, the "Bluetooth Speaker ,LESHP Metal Bluetooth Wireless Speaker with Super Bass, Perfect Sound Speaker for Golf, Beach, Shower , Home"
customer_reviews.author: ixi

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my almost 2 year old daughter so she’d stop taking my phone to listen to music. It’s great for what I need. She loves it and she’s been running around with it with no issues. The sound quality is about what I’d expect for the price. I was surprised by how loud I could make it. It’ll be good for taking outside for yard work or those times when my phone speaker isn’t loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea H

customer_reviews.title: This speaker would be a value at 3x the price. Don't pass it up.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it 10 stars. This would be a value at 3x the price! It's loud, it's pretty, and it's solid. I use it for audio books. Sometimes hang it up, sometimes set it beside my bed. I wear it around my neck when I'm cleaning, and can still hear other things in the house, not like when I'm wearing earphones. I've been using it solid since I got it for Christmas, and have had no problem with it. Connects easily, good range. Love it love it love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was a Mother’s Day gift. I’ve been using it daily for a couple of weeks now and I absolutely love it! Great sound quality with a very big sound! It charges quickly and the charge lasts for hours. I’ve used it for 5 hours constant and it still wasn’t dead. It syncs easily and the color change feature is easy to use. I like that I can make and answer calls with it, too! My only complaint is that is almost to loud for my office. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: RJPro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carry speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! I am able to carry it room to room with me and not miss anything. My laptop speakers suck- but now that I have this I dont have to strain to hear anything. The light is just a fun bonus.And the silicone strap-great idea-perfect for carry and hang where ever you go!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Asche

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it all the time, in the shower, while playing outside, with friends. The sound quality is loud & clear! It's durable, it's waterproof, it's colorful, it changes colors, it hangs off her bike, her toys or can be put down in position! Whatever she choses! It's lots of fun!! Thanks for the great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chanie H

customer_reviews.title: Great solid, little gadget
customer_reviews.text: These look great for my 7 year old niece. I bought two....one for me to test and one for my niece. Great little gadget. Almost perfect except for one thing...the light/s on the bottom do not flicker in sync with the music. That feature would have made these perfect. Glad I purchased two. Inexpensive and good quality. I would buy another one in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Gauntletwielder

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Bought this for a present. It's been dropped on the floor and down the stairs, kicked, packed in luggage, taken to overnight trips, thrown in a baseball bag and hauled to games and still works like the day we opened it! The music is loud and clear and super easy to set up. I would definitely buy another one as another present or maybe for myself. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: Durable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sound is a little flat, but thats ok. I bought 2 of them for my kids and they just love them so very much. They seem pretty durable, seeing how my 2 year old likes to fling it around and bounce it off of everything and it still works!
customer_reviews.author: JNizzle

customer_reviews.title: Why can't I exchange a defective product??
customer_reviews.text: The speaker wouldn't charge. It was supposed to flash when it was charging, and no matter what I did, I couldn't get it to charge. So it never had enough battery to pair. I would have loved to exchange this, since this seemed like a good speaker/price, but wasn't given that option.
customer_reviews.author: MNMOM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just gave this to my granddaughter for Christmas and became the hero of the night! It took only a few seconds to sync to her phone and the sound was so clear that the adult children now want one. It is attractive, made of durable material and will easily attach to a backpack or similar item. Plus it lights up! I am now ordering more(maybe one for me).
customer_reviews.author: buggsy

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! its a slight pain getting it to sinc up to my devices .it needs a volume button on it and this would get a 20 + rating . but the leds are super bright and the sound is load. a little too loud when using my ipad or android. i'd buy again . if they add a volume button i'd buy a billon .
customer_reviews.author: SilverDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend, but I couldn't resist trying it out before giving it to him. The sound was loud and clear, and the lights were a nice touch. He seemed excited when he opened it up, so that's good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price ordered for my son haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price ordered for my son haven't had it on long only did test run as I bought for him for Easter when tested was loud and sounded good. Will probably be ordering another one for myself:-)
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kane

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, super sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my daughters for Christmas and they love them! They are small, easy to use with big sound and the fact that it is lighted makes it super cute. Can't wait to see how these hold up by the pool this coming summer!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hill

customer_reviews.title: absolutely great for its price!
customer_reviews.text: For its price, the sound is clean and can get loud if needed. I enjoy it a lot! can be used either as a speaker for music, but can also be used for the phone, as it has also a microphone. I didn't find the manual on the manufacturer's website, but I sent them an email, and got a very prompt response, with the manual attached!
customer_reviews.author: Hagai N.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, great price
customer_reviews.text: This cheap little speaker is awesome! I wasn't expecting much but it has great sound and I can leave my phone in the kitchen and carry the speaker all through the house and it still connects. I'm impressed. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for a while and I love it. My daughter loves that it lights up
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while and I love it . My daughter loves that it lights up. Light is pretty bright and love the colors. Sound is pretty clear as well. Would definitely buy again and recommend 😁
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase at perfect price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hangs this speaker on her towel hook while she is singing in the shower. The speaker is plenty loud to hear the music clearly over the shower running. Perfect purchase at perfect price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Best Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 30 of these speakers for an incentive prize for our PTA fundraiser. They are surprisingly very good quality for the price! The sound quality is very good too. They hold a charge for quite awhile. My kids have loved theirs; they are excited to take them camping.
customer_reviews.author: Krjohns

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it. The sound was pretty good for such ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a cute little gadget. My daughter loved it. The sound was pretty good for such a small speaker. Lights were entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound! We can't believe the quality of sound from something so small and portable! It was a gift for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to hook up to my phone and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to hook up to my phone and carry around anywhere. The one thing that is cool is the volume control is with my phone. For the price you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought 8 of these as gifts for teenage nieces and nephews. They were a hit. We added a vinyl monogram to them as well to make them a little more personal. The sound is great for a speaker of this price point and the kids LOVE using them in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great speaker, safe for kids
customer_reviews.text: It's a great speaker, safe for kids, super cute, good sounds. I had to give 5 stars!! I'll buy a couple more, its great for stuff outside, camping, picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, 5 year old can use!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for $11! My 5 year old finds it very easy to use and it has amazing sound. The colors are so fun as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: My son loved his birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This little speaker puts out some good sound. I bought it for my son because he wanted a bluetooth speaker like mommy. Its great because he can use it while he rides his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Rawling

customer_reviews.title: worked great until my niece used it as a weapon and ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great until my niece used it as a weapon and now it doesnt work. Keep out of reach of children... My other one works great still though!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick D. Chu

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing from such a small unit. I had to purchase 3 more for friends. I like that you can make and receive calls through it too. Waterproof, cute just a good item.
customer_reviews.author: QTZGRL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this and the sound is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: only thing i do not like about it is if it is dead and you ...
customer_reviews.text: only thing i do not like about it is if it is dead and you put it on the charger it WILL NOT connect to your device until fully charged otherwise good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the sound quality of this amazing little speaker and ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the sound quality of this amazing little speaker and it also is much louder then any of my other hand held speakers. The light show is extra fun in the evening when you are outside.
customer_reviews.author: Shina

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little Bluetooth speaker, my biggest issue is that there is no option to be able to turn off the light all together. It is extremely bright! We use this in our daughter's room and we have to wrap it with paper to dull the light down.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Child Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice flashing colors. For 6 year old. Hangs on handle bars, great for outdoor play, camping, Bluetooth for kids. Great gift. Works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Autism therapist

customer_reviews.title: All the sound of a tin can! You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's a shower radio. It sounds like a shower radio under $20. It works fine. But lacks bass. Sounds like it's coming out of a tin can. But for the price, it's fine. Truth is, I'm using a different/better speaker most of the time. Probably didn't need to waste my money on two speakers.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleSunshine

customer_reviews.title: ... with the kids and if they got a tablet like kids are using now they can listen to all ...
customer_reviews.text: these are a hit with the kids and if they got a tablet like kids are using now they can listen to all their music and for the price this is a screaming deal...
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far, good sound and nice overall package. Will update as to how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Bestpaboxer

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker amazing great sound and the light pattern ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker amazing great sound and the light pattern rocks great little speaker love that you can hang it i use this speaker in my car as well as outside on my patio I hang it on a tree branch it's great totally worth the money 👍
customer_reviews.author: conception

customer_reviews.title: Great colorful little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, programmable colors, and very portable. My daughter hung it from her ceiling fan. Connected very quickly to our devices.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought for friends toddler, she loves music and love this
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for the price. Bought one for each kid.
customer_reviews.author: Anjanette Cooper

customer_reviews.title: but love the look and how quickly it came
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Purchased this for my daughter to use in her room, around the house, or even take with her. Its a Christmas gift so I haven't tried it yet, but love the look and how quickly it came!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Smelcer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a month
customer_reviews.text: Won't purchase or recommend. Just a little over a month after purchasing, the speaker does now work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus-Kendra Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Light up hang up Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a Bluetooth for my kids. They can chuck it in bathroom while showering and leave phone out of the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Dewdrop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for adults and super cool for kids. Bought one more in blue
customer_reviews.author: Roselis

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Did work great but speaker quit after 1 month now just night light
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Snacker

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound from such a small Bluetooth speaker. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jim T.

customer_reviews.title: Great with a pretty good sound for an inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Great with a pretty good sound for an inexpensive, bluetooth speaker. Bought two for Christmas gifts...both have been greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the shower. I bought this so I wouldn't have to have my phone close to water - works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Gusman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound!! We use it in our backyard and it's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... one for each of my kids and they've both enjoyed them very much
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for each of my kids and they've both enjoyed them very much. Great in the bathroom while getting ready, daughter uses hers in her car, hangs nicely from rearview mirror. They're very well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my wife and she really loves it, really high quality and pretty good sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: moises

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Sound is pretty good, speaker is great for kids. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: I really love it. It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. It does the job. I wish it had its own volume controller. Overall, a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: SiniStar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It is sometimes hard to connect. But it usually only takes 3 tries.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This speaker went beyond my exception. Its water resistant allows me to take showers and hear my music. It is a Small speaker but its loud so far I've enjoyed it the real test is to see if it stays the same quality after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Kolasa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for traveling can have music poolside, on the balcony or at a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: John Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker, I use it in my car to listen to pandora.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it stopped charging a week after I got it and I couldn't return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the recipient seemed to like it!
customer_reviews.author: Vapid

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat for quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This product really can't be beat, it's easy to use, colourful, loud, and good quality sound. It really can't be beat for the price and is easily portable. It's about 3.5 in in length and about 2.25 in width. The colors are vibrant and can be easily changed with two click's of the button on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Sue J.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was bad, and it stopped working after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn B.

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The speaker isn't that loud but the light works great I can't find out how to turn the thing up and down but for the price it's a nice product
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has good sound and it's pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Buzek

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Audio isn't amazing but perfectly reasonable for the price. Would recommend as a buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wieland

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and stays juiced up for quite a while
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and stays juiced up for quite a while. I hang it from my rearview mirror and bluetooth it to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It only worked two times and then would not do anything but light up
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the shower.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, but not waterproof. Works in the shower but do not dip it in water. Mine freaked out and then later died.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lights are a plus, but the real reason I bought this was for the great quality and loudness of the sound. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly with my Echo Dot, was very easy to pair, and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia I

customer_reviews.title: Good sound! I wouldn't give it two thumbs up ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound! I wouldn't give it two thumbs up but definitely one. Good sound but the rubber part of the speaker broke.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Jones

customer_reviews.title: I found a BIG sound in this small speaker..
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing and so much louder than any other Bluetooth speaker that I have. Charging was simple and the battery lasts so much longer than other speakers the same size. It adds additional light in the shower which helps with shaving. Also, I am able to pause the music anytime my husband or kids come knocking on the door by simply pushing the button on the bottom one time. I can change the color of the light by pressing the button twice. But the sound is so amazing and clear.. Well worth purchasing..
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. 😥
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I had high expectations. First of all, you get a tiny itty-bitty excuse for a manual with a few crappy instructions. Then, you cannot “Up” the volume except from your iPhone (what if you really want to jam, know what I mean??). All in all, not worth it. Seller, however, was excellent: Shipped it immediately. Sadly, product just did not live up to its fame.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Parten

customer_reviews.title: They are nice when they do work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, one didn't work right out of the box so I had to return it and order a new one. Now over the weekend the other one quit charging so I think I will try something else. They are nice when they do work!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for it with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Price

customer_reviews.title: This small speaker is just okay. It isn't very ...
customer_reviews.text: This small speaker is just okay. It isn't very loud especially when used via bluetooth from a cell phone. It is okay for small spaces or rooms.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Broken cord and didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The cord was broken and the product wouldn't work. If I could give it 0 stars I would.

product_meta.title: LIGHTSTORY Mini Speaker with Colorful LED Light, for Kids Boys Girls (Grey)
feature_bullets: Color change night light: smart sports wireless speaker supports up to 7 colors for option, and two more fast/slow-flash mode, really funny. Double press the set button quickly per time, to switch the model, by the order: green-white-red-blue-purple-yellow-cyan-fast flash-slow flash-green.

Wireless Bluetooth speaker: Bluetooth wireless sports speaker supports Bluetooth 4.1, Easy Connection works with all Bluetooth-enabled devices: smart phones, pads, laptops and desktops, MP3 & DVD players, etc.

Portable sports speaker: Super lanyard design for the smart firefly speaker, make it easy to be tied on your bicycle, bags and other belongings, let the music to accompany your sports, cool portable night light.
Humanized design portable speakers: IPX4 water proof for smart speaker, 360 degree stereo music surround, full-color display of 16, 000, 000 colors.
Built in mic smart LED speakers: The Bluetooth wireless speaker supports hands-free phone calls & outstanding Bluetooth Connection range up to 33 feet for convenient wireless freedom.
